label: AB_hP8_194_ac_f-003
title: LiO Structure
comments:
(Feh\'{e}r, 1953) and (F\"{o}ppl, 1957) presented competing structures for LiO, both in space group $P\overline{6}$ \#174.  First-principles calculation by (Cota, 2005) and (Chen, 2011) suggest that the F\"{o}ppl structure is correct, but show that the proper space group is $P6_{3}/mmc$ \#194.  This is generally held to be the correct structure, {\em e.g.} (Jain, 2013).  We use the symmetrization of F\"{o}ppl's original data made by (Cota, 2005). 
 The ICSD entry is from F\"{o}ppl, 1957), updated to make the space group $P6_{3}/mmc$.
